title: Foxy Shazam - The Flamingo Trigger
description:
The Flamingo Trigger is Foxy Shazam\&#039;s debut album released on June 15, 2005. The release was independent and brought them into a tour across North America. Fan favorites include songs like No Don\&#039;t Shoot, The French Passion of Animality Opera, and October Surf Suitcase Fish. The tour lasted for eighteen months and word of mouth quickly spread Foxy Shazam\&#039;s popularity.

Track listing

   1. \"The French Passion of Animality Opera\" - 2:53
   2. \"NO. Don\&#039;t Shoot\" - 3:28
   3. \"October Surf Suitcase Fish\" - 2:41
   4. \"Seagulls Over Rhinosouras Bay Part I\" - 2:49
   5. \"Seagulls Over Rhinosouras Bay Part II\" - 2:43
   6. \"Aroma of You\" - 2:55
   7. \"------------\" - 2:21
   8. \"Sailors Over Rhinoceros Bay\" - 3:04
   9. \"Brains of Vegas\" - 3:32
  10. \"My Wife\&#039;s Juice and Water Tower Wine\" - 3:17
  11. \"Across the Golden Field\" - 3:33
  12. \"Shadow of a Shoulder Parrot\" - 3:48

Bit Rate: 192kbps

Uploaders Note: If you all enjoyed Foxy Shazam\&#039;s (2nd Album) Introducing prepare for a slightly heavier and wilder side to their music.  If you all enjoy this album and the energy it brings with it I highly recommend seeing these guys in concert - it is quite the unique experience.
